seo.title: Car rentals in Omaha, NE | FriendRenter
seo.metaDescription: Local car rentals in Omaha — verified people, fair prices, quick pickup near Eppley, Old Market, and Midtown. Friends-first bookings with clear protections.

hero.headline: Omaha car rentals — no counter, no lines.
hero.subhead: Old Market, Midtown, Benson — verified cars across the city. Add → accept → book.

valueProps.title: Airport-adjacent pickup
valueProps.desc: Use the rideshare lot at Eppley when available.

valueProps.title: Neighborhood meetups
valueProps.desc: Public garages in Old Market & Midtown Crossing.

valueProps.title: Transparent pricing
valueProps.desc: What you see is what you pay — no desk add-ons.

howItWorksLocal.title: Meet at a public garage or lot
howItWorksLocal.desc: Hosts specify the exact spot for easy handoff.

howItWorksLocal.title: Return to the same spot
howItWorksLocal.desc: Unless you arrange otherwise with the host.

pickupAreas.name: Eppley rideshare lot
pickupAreas.tip: Terminal curbside only if host offers.

pickupAreas.name: Old Market garages
pickupAreas.tip: Event nights can be busy — plan ahead.

faq.a: Usually the rideshare lot; terminal curbside if the host offers it.
Minimal; any tolls are billed post-trip via the app.
Reserve early around Old Market events and concert nights.
A temporary hold (e.g., $200–$300) is placed and released after return if no issues.
Shown on each listing; ask your host if you’re unsure.
